summary.description: Workflow for Improved Peak Picking for Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) Data | large scale GC-MS data preprocessing workflow | WiPP - A Workflow for improved Peak Picking - Quick Start Guide | WiPP is an open source large scale GC-MS data preprocessing workflow built in Python 3 that uses machine learning to optimise, automate and combine the peak detection process of commonly used peak picking algorithms
summary.name: WiPP
